findings.title: Active Smart Contract Owner Privileges
findings.description: The active smart contract owner has elevated impact to the smart contract's safety and security.

findings.title: Unrestricted Buyback Tokens
findings.description: The smart contract can buy back tokens from the total supply without restriction.
findings.location: MetaSantaFloki.sol, function module for buying back tokens

findings.title: Changeable Fees
findings.description: The smart contract owner can change the buy and sell fees without threshold restrictions, which may impose extraordinary transaction fees.
findings.location: MetaSantaFloki.sol, function module for changing fees

findings.title: Low Severity Issue
findings.description: The smart contract has a low severity issue that may or may not create any functional vulnerability.

findings.title: Max Transaction Percentage Modification
findings.description: The smart contract owner can change the max transaction percentage, which may be set to zero.
findings.location: MetaSantaFloki.sol, function module for changing max transaction percentage
